name: maintainerr
tagline: A dashboard for monitoring activity across media server stacks
description: Maintainerr is a dashboard and event log viewer for monitoring a suite of self-hosted media servers. It connects to services like Jellyfin, Radarr, and Sonarr to track updates, downloads, and system status.

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Track status and events from Jellyfin, Plex, Radarr, and Sonarr in one dashboard

features.title: Event Logging
features.description: View detailed logs of downloads, updates, and system events across all connected services

features.title: Offline Mode
features.description: Monitor service availability and receive alerts when components go offline

features.title: Media Library
features.description: See when new content is added or existing content is upgraded across your media stack

features.title: Unified Dashboard
features.description: Access all media server metrics and logs from a single interface

features.title: Download Monitoring
features.description: Track active downloads and queue status from Radarr and Sonarr

features.title: Storage Metrics
features.description: View disk usage and available space across media library locations

features.title: REST API
features.description: Connect to multiple media services through their APIs for comprehensive monitoring
